amendatorysection.para: The license provided for in sections 28-1421 and 28-1422 shall, when issued, authorize the sale of cigars, tobacco, electronic nicotine delivery systems, cigarettes, and cigarette material by the licensee and employees, to persons nineteen years of age or over, at the place of business described in such license for the term therein authorized, unless the license is forfeited as provided in section 28-1425.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB149, section 7, with LB397, section 7, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB397 became effective September 1, 2019. Changes made by LB149 became operative January 1, 2020.
